name: TickborneRelapsingFeverTestsForBorreliaHermsiimiyamotoiparkeriituricataeAntibodyByImmunoassay
title: Tickborne Relapsing Fever (Tests for Borrelia hermsii/miyamotoi/parkerii/turicatae Antibody by Immunoassay)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Tickborne Relapsing Fever antibodies by EIA IFA.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC: Borrelia hermsii/parkerii/turicatae/miyamotoi probe; 

LOINC search: Borrelia (hermsii OR parkerii OR turicatae) Ab (EIA OR Immunofluorescence) (System:CSF OR System:Ser) -panel -Property:Imp),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
